description.narrative: To contribute to the improvement of domestic revenue mobilization and public expenditures management, and of reinforcing a performance oriented management culture in the Ministry of Finance.

Total Disbursement in Fourth Quarter of 2018

title.narrative: Rolling out e-GP in the pilot phase in 3 or more departments
Large projects are properly appraised with the support of a new PIM Unit to be established
Increased domestic revenue as a percentage of GDP
Effective implementation by budgetary units on the external audit recommendations
Gender budget statements developed for key ministries
Percentage increase in custom duties through enhancement of ASYCUDA customs automation
Increased budget execution rate of the provinces by implementing new provincial budgeting policy.
Improvement in core institutional capacity, represented by a reduction in the number of long-term technical assistants
Improvement in performance management coverage, represented by an increase in the number of teams adopting FPIP
Afghanistan Institute of Certified Public Accountants (CPA) established and two batches trained

target.value: Institute established, CPA law enacted, and curriculum developed

actual.value: Associate Memberships of SAFA and CAPA are obtained.

title.narrative: Increased number of active tax filers
Staff and business processes are in place for VAT implementation in 2020

baseline.value: No staff or processes in place

target.value: VAT business processes developed and staff trained

actual.value: Preparation for the VAT implementation is in progress

title.narrative: Approved time-bound development and migration plan to a new AFMIS platform
Establishment of Asset Inventory Management System
Transparency and citizen engagement in reform planning, represented by timely publication of annual and mid-year FPIP assessment reports
Implement ARD Re-Organization and Modernization Plan

target.value: All regional revenue offices report to ARD

actual.value: There is no reorganization and modernization plan submitted for Cabinet approval
